scripts.pre-release: yarn test && yarn build && cp package.json dist/ && npm publish --dry-run --access public dist
scripts.re-link: cd dist && (yarn unlink || echo 'no package to unlink') && yarn link && cd .. && yarn link @algolia/json-stream-analyzer
scripts.pre-release-test: yarn pre-release && yarn re-link && jest --config jest.pre-release.config.js
scripts.release: (npm whoami || (echo 'this command must be run from npm and not yarn' && exit 1)) && yarn pre-release-test && yarn version && cp package.json dist/ && cp README.md dist/ && cp LICENSE dist/ && npm publish --access public dist && git push origin master
